sgvg.name: /dev/color
sgvg.description: A community of Black software engineers who help one another achieve ambitious career goals

sgvg.name: New Story
sgvg.description: New Story connects donors with homeless families around the world to create life-changing stories

sgvg.name: SunFarmer
sgvg.description: Sunfarmer is a non-profit that installs solar energy in hospitals, health clinics, and schools in the developing world

sgvg.name: 80,000 Hours
sgvg.description: An online guide that tells talented graduates how to maximize the social impact of their careers.

sgvg.name: InnerSpace
sgvg.description: A wisdom community for startup founders

sgvg.name: Detroit Water Project
sgvg.description: The Detroit Water Project is a platform to help donors pay the delinquent water bills of people in Detroit

sgvg.name: DemocracyOS
sgvg.description: DemocracyOS is a software platform that allows regular voters to debate and forward policy ideas

sgvg.name: SIRUM
sgvg.description: SIRUM saves lives by connecting unopened unexpired medications to patients in need

sgvg.name: Bayes Impact
sgvg.description: Non-profit organization dedicated to solving big social problems with #datascience

sgvg.name: CareMessage
sgvg.description: CareMessage helps clinics, hospitals, community programs and government agencies connect with at-risk patients through the use of text and voice messaging.

sgvg.name: One Degree
sgvg.description: An online platform that makes it easier to find social services for anyone with online access. Currently focused on the Bay Area.

sgvg.name: Zidisha
sgvg.description: Person to person microlending: Zidisha allows people to lend small amounts of money directly to entrepreneurs in developing countries.

sgvg.name: Noora Health
sgvg.description: Empowering margenalized patients & families with high-impact medical skills to improve health outcomes in India & US

sgvg.name: CodeNow
sgvg.description: Teaches under-represented youth to code with a mission to diversify the talent pipeline of students who pursue computer science and technology

sgvg.name: Immunity Project
sgvg.description: The Immunity Project is working to deliver a free vaccine to prevent HIV and AIDs

sgvg.name: Watsi
sgvg.description: All over the world people are dying of treatable illnesses because they can't afford basic medical care. Watsi connects you with patients in serious need of low-cost medical care and enables you to fund high-impact treatments.
